pie-1.title: Q1: Do you have an awareness of kidney transplantation?

data.name: A.Yes, underwent a kidney transplant before. /Yes, friends or relatives of mine have undergone a kidney transplant in the past.
B.Yes, fully understand its principles and techniques.
C.Yes, only a little.
D.Not at all.

pie-2.title: Q2:How much do you know about the rejection reaction?

data.name: A.Completely, and my career is related to it.
B.Very, and I have read relevant literatures.
C.A few, heard from TV programs or books
D.Not much, only know how to spell it.
E.Not at all.

pie-3.title: Q3:What is the major factor that may affect your choice of detection techniques?

data.name: A.price
B.convenience
C.accuracy

pie-4.title: Q4: Do you realize how serious the rejection reaction is?

data.name: A.Nothing to worry about.
B.It will do some harm to people’s health.
C.It may be truly harmful to patients’ bodies.
D.It can take people’s lives.

pie-5.title: Q5: Are you looking forward to the technology of detecting whether there is rejection reaction from the patient's urine and blood?

data.name: A.yes, and I will query relative information frequently and popularize it to others.
B.Yes, and I have an interest in it.
C.Yes, and I am looking forward to its launch.
D.No, nothing changes in my life without it.
E.No, please do not design such products.
